name: <partner>
string:
Ah <player>…
I don't think
Dad's dream will
come true like
this… So, I
decided to set
a goal. Let's
try to have
more than three
of each animal
and ship over
300 crops by the
end of next
Winter. I want
you to help me.

<noname><name>0 OK! I'm ready.
 No way.<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
Really? You'll
help me? Thanks
<player>! Let's work
hard together!

name: <partner>
string:
No? I like
having a clear
goal. Please
<player>, help me.
<noname><name>0 OK, I'll try.
 No way.<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
Together we can
make anything
possible. Ha ha.
Dad used to say
that a lot.
Thanks <player>!

name: <partner>
string:
Why can't you at
least try? …
I'm going out…

name: <partner>
string:
Umm…<player>…I
don't know…
there is someー
thing wrong with
me… I made a
silly mistake…
Is it impossible
for me to make
Dad's dream come
true…?
<noname><name>0 Just a dream?
 Yeah, I guess.<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
It's not just a
dream…
Together we can
make anything
possible. Yes,
I shouldn't be
depressed over
little things
like this. Thank
you <player>.

name: <partner>
string:
What? Are you
saying I'm inー
capable? You've
worked on a farm
before, but…
I…I'm trying
my best! I don't
need you to feel
sorry for me!!!
Can't you be
a little nicer?
…Sorry <player>.
I want to be
alone right now.

name: <partner>
string:
Hi <player>.
I'm so hungry!
How about you?
… … … …
… … What?

<noname><name>0 I'm sorry…
 ……<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
…It's OK.
Let's get to
work now!

name: <partner>
string:
Uhh…<player>? Huh?
Oh, nothing…

name: <partner>
string:
Uhh… I…
Nevermind…

name: <partner>
string:
Your dad wrote
me a letter… I
found it in the
chest… ‘Live
for your dream!'
… I feel kind
of lonely… …
Hee hee. You're
here with me, so
I'm not really
lonely …but…
Ha ha ha.
OK! Another busy
day tomorrow!

name: <partner>
string:
Eeeck! <player>?
What was that?

name: <partner>
string:
Kyaaaaaaaa!!!
I'm scared of
the dark… Umm,
please don't go
anywhere <player>!

name: <partner>
string:
…Is the
electricity
back? Thanks
<player>…

name: <partner>
string:
Wa…Wait <player>.
Where are you?<arrow>0

name: <partner>
string:
… … … …
Oh, the
electricity is
back… I asked
you not to go
anywhere… I
was so scared…

name: <partner>
string:
What date is
it today?
<var>4 <var>C?
It's by birthー
day today!!

name: <partner>
string:
Is this a
birthday gift?
Thanks <player>!
Yeah! I'm happy.

name: <partner>
string:
What the…? A
birthday gift?
…Thanks, I
guess…

name: <partner>
string:
A birthday gift
is not about
quantity, so
I don't need
anymore <player>.
Thanks anyway.

name: <partner>
string:
<player>? Do you
want to go
somewhere with a
real pretty
view?
<noname><name>0 OK. Where?
 I'm tired…<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
You know where
we can see the
mainland from?
Please come by
midnight. I'll
be waiting.

name: <partner>
string:
We're busy
everyday… I
will go anyway.
You should go
out sometimes,
too.

name: <partner>
string:
<player>…Ah…
I have something
to tell you…
Can you come to
the cliff, the
one with a
pretty view at
night?
I'll be waiting.

name: <partner>
string:
Ah, <player>.
What? This?
It's my dad's
photo album.
I just found
it. Look, she
looks like me…

<noname><name>0 Your Mom?
 His first love?<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
Dad treasured
it, so I think
she is my Mom.
But…

name: <partner>
string:
No! He didn't
even have Mom's
picture… I
guess his first
love could have
been my Mom too…

name: <partner>
string:
Either way, I
don't remember
my Mom… She
passed away when
I was three…

<noname><name>0 Miss her?
 Mom's annoying.<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
It'd be a lie if
I said I didn't
miss her. I'm a
girl, you know?
There are things
I wanted to
share with a
Mom, not with a
Dad. She lives
in my heart,
though.

name: <partner>
string:
Do you think
so? My friends
at school told
me the same
thing…
Are moms really
just annoying?
I can't believe
that…

name: <partner>
string:
Listen <player>!
Bigbee told me
that he saw a
cub drinking
water in the
forest… It's
supposed to be
fluffy and cute
like a stuffed
animal… Do you
want to go see
it?
<noname><name>0 Don't go.
 Go by yourself.<ask>

name: <partner>
string:
It's OK! I'm
going right now.

name: <partner>
string:
You don't want
to go? Mmm… I
am going anyway.
I'll come home
tomorrow.
Come if you
change your
mind.

name: <player>
string:
Huh? <var>0 is
not back? someー
thing must have
happened in the
forest…

name: <player>
string:
Since then, <var>0
didn't come
home… I should
have gone to the

at that time…
It's too late…
<var>0 is gone…

The End
